channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Unlocking Growth And Ensuring Compliance: Data Management In Pharma
item.description: Let's examine how industry leaders can get the most out of their CMDM.

item.title: Nineball Model Kit From ‘Armored Core’ Gets A Long Overdue Re-Release
item.description: Originally released back in 2011, a classic model kit of Nineball from the first 'Armored Core' will be released next June.

item.title: Meet The Rio Tinto Backed Startups Set To Decarbonize And Transform Mining
item.description: This move aligns with Rio Tinto's focus on the green economy, as lithium is a crucial component in electric car batteries.

item.title: Microsoft Explains Why Windows 11 Update Is ‘Stealing’ Storage
item.description: Microsoft claims a "reporting error" is to blame for Windows 11 24H2 appearing to steal gigabytes of data on users' PCs.
